caption.p: MTT assay for determining the cell viability of the developed nanofibrous mats: HTCs, HTCs-capsaicin, HTCs-AuNPs and HTCs-capsaicin/AuNPs. Aquacel ® Ag was the positive control an in both test. (Data are presented as mean ± S.D., (* P < 0.05; ** P < 0.01; *** P < 0.001); n = 3. (CA refers to capsaicin).
